description:
AJKI-05 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Grey

Dive into the depths of sophistication with this graphite gray ensemble. The stunning shirt, embroidered with intricate threadwork in gray, lilac, and navy blue creates a symphony of color. The shimmering two-toned zari and silver sequins add a sparkle reminiscent of moonlit nights. Adorned with paisley motifs that honor traditional artistry, the embroidered shawl in navy-blue shade, featuring heavily embroidered pallus, completes this luxurious look, ensuring you shine brightly in any winter gathering.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on self twill
Embroidered front side panel left on self twill
Embroidered front side panel right on self twill
30” embroidered border for front daman on self twill
30” embroidered back with border on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered border for front & back chaak on self twill
2-meter embroidered shawl center with 4-side border on self twill
2 embroidered pallu right & left for shawl on self twill
1.5-meter wide-width self twill for trouser
